title: Red Hand
detail_text: <:th_ch0203/>Hm? Your hands are a little red, aren’t they, Kanata-san?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Aaah, maybe Kanata has been doing too much dishwashing? But it’s normal like this, so no need to worry~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Now that I noticed it, I can’t leave you be. It may be none of my business, but please use this hand cream.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>You’re so kind, Shizuku-chan~. Then, put it on for me! Please~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Fufu, sure. Roll up your sleeves and hold both of your hands out.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Okay~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Tell me if it stings, okay? Alright, *smear smear*~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Hnn, it smells good.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>It’s tuberose. It gives off a flowery feeling, right?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Yeah. It’s very relaxing.... zzz....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
